title: Naomi Klein on Capitalism and Climate Change-Nov 15, 2012-Moyers
description:
Naomi Klein on Capitalism and Climate Change-Nov 15, 2012-Moyers & Company


November 15, 2012

Naomi Klein, author of the international bestseller The Shock Doctrine, says the tragic destruction of Hurricane Sandy can also be the catalyst for the transformation of politics and our economy.
